trans-unit.source: Represents a control that allows the user to select a single item from a drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: 表示允许用户从下拉列表中选择单个项的控件。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主题内容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#Introduction)
trans-unit.target: [介绍](#Introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Accessibility](#Accessibility)
trans-unit.target: [辅助功能](#Accessibility)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax)
trans-unit.target: [声明性语法](#DeclarativeSyntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control to create a single-selection drop-down list control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件创建单项选择下拉列表控件。

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderWidth%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以控制的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderColor%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderWidth%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify the items that you want to appear in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control, place a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定你想要显示在项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制，请将放<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>每个条目开始和结束标记之间的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control also supports data binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件还支持数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: To bind the control to a data source, create a data source, such as a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType> object, that contains the items to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要将控件绑定到数据源，创建数据源，如<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象，包含要在控件中显示的项。

trans-unit.source: Then, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to bind the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 然后，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来绑定到数据源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.SelectedIndex%2A> property to programmatically determine the index of the item selected by the user from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.SelectedIndex%2A>属性以编程方式确定用户从选定的项的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The index can then be used to retrieve the selected item from the `Items` collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以使用索引检索的选定的项`Items`在控件集合。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 可访问性

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 声明性语法

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191893).
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191893)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control that contains four items.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>包含四个项的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control though data binding.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制通过数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>类。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream that renders HTML contents to the client.
trans-unit.target: 表示在客户端上呈现 HTML 内容的输出流的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将需要呈现的 HTML 特性和样式添加到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> class.
trans-unit.target: 派生从自定义控件时，主要由控件开发人员使用此成员<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the border color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件的边框颜色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderColor%2A> property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderColor%2A>属性继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类并不是适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to get or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderColor%2A> property in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何获取或设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderColor%2A>中自定义属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: For information about using custom server controls, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用自定义服务器控件的信息，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义的 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderStyle%2A> property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderStyle%2A>属性继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类并不是适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" /> that represents the border width for the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件的边框宽度的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderWidth%2A> property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.BorderWidth%2A>属性继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类并不是适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection to store child controls.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于存储子控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Always returns an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.CreateControlCollection%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection> class for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.CreateControlCollection%2A>方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终返回的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection>类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: For information about using custom server controls, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用自定义服务器控件的信息，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义的 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The index within the posted collection that references the content to load.
trans-unit.target: 已发布集合中引用要加载的内容的索引。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 发布到服务器的所有传入名称值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Processes postback data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 处理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> 控件的回发数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> control's state changes as a result of the postback event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果回发事件导致 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> 控件的状态发生更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` from this method call, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 页框架跟踪返回的所有服务器控件`true`从此方法调用，并调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> control when postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: 回发发生时引发 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> 控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page framework calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.LoadPostData%2A> method indicates that the state of the list items has changed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 页面框架调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.LoadPostData%2A>方法指示列表项的状态已更改在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to perform custom processing when the user selects items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件开发人员可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>方法以执行自定义处理，当用户选择控件中的项。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> 控件中的选定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> 控件中的选定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0, which selects the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0，该值选择列表中的第一项。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.SelectedIndex%2A> property to programmatically specify or determine the index of the selected item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.SelectedIndex%2A>属性以编程方式指定或确定的选定项的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: An item is always selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 始终中选择一项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You cannot clear the selection from every item in the list at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 无法清除在同一时间从列表中每个项选择。

trans-unit.source: The indexes for the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control are zero-based.
trans-unit.target: 中的项的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件是从零开始。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.SelectedIndex%2A> property to determine the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList.SelectedIndex%2A>属性来确定中的选定的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <see langword="disabled" /> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled" /> 属性为 <see langword="false" /> 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 <see langword="disabled" /> 特性设置为 "disabled"。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility" /> property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than <c>4.0</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility" />属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于<c>4.0</c>; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时控件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时控件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The key value used to index an entry in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用于对集合中的项进行索引的键值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> that contains post information.
trans-unit.target: 包含发布信息的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes posted data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 处理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> 控件的已发布数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the posted content is different from the last posting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果发布的内容不同于上次发布的内容，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> control on postback.
trans-unit.target: 回发时引发 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> 控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: Always throws an <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpException" /> exception because multiple selection is not supported for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 始终引发 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpException" /> 异常，因为对于 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList" /> 控件不支持多选。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control does not support multiple selections and throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件不支持多个选择，则将引发<xref:System.Web.HttpException>异常。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下。
